message: Let's start with a fair-ish split.  I'll take the lion's share, but I'll leave you a thousand to be generous.  :)
Your offer was a bit too lopsided Alice.  How about something more even? This is the best offer you'll get from me.
Okay, I'll compromise. How about a 60/40 split? This is the last time I'm going to be this generous. You'll only get less if you keep rejecting my offers.
